about_the_game:
You've awakened in a strange but familiar place? You now are exploring this exciting new form of your world.
You and your new found friend must traverse and try to conquer each level throughout.

You must try making it through the different realms of this strange place. With unique enemy's with strange abilities around every turn, It won't be an easy feat.

Using an ability that Orbie has gained by joining forces with you, you will defeat these enemies standing in your way by shooting and platforming in strange and unknown realms.

Throughout your gameplay you will encounter souls that have been fragmented trying to follow the path you are on now but have failed. By collecting and helping these souls you will gain strength for your new found friend which these enemies haven't seen before.

TL;DR : Playing as a young boy who has gone through a terrible tragedy, and arrived in a type of purgatory, you will explore areas, defeat unforeseen enemies, and save souls who have been fragmented, all within familiar worlds.

Throughout your gameplay you will encounter souls that have been fragmented trying to follow the path you are on now but have failed. By collecting and helping these souls you will gain strength for your new found friend which these enemies haven't seen before.

TL;DR : Playing as a young boy who has gone through a terrible tragedy, and arrived in a type of purgatory, you will explore areas, defeat unforeseen enemies, and save souls who have been fragmented, all within familiar worlds.
name: Don't Go

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: dual core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia or Amd (2gb Vram)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: For basic function of gaming at 720p lowest settings
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: quad core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 2070 or Amd 6700
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: An imagination fueled adventure. With a boy lost in a familiar world. Help him and his friend Orbie traverse a small but large world. While defending against any unfriendly creatures they might come across! Run, jump and shoot your way through the unknown. To find the truth for them both.
